name: Control Room
description: Banks of ancient consoles line the walls, their screens displaying flickering fragments of Earth, Gorstan, and Elfhame. A coffee-stained manual sits next to a lever labelled *Reality Override*. Behind a cracked panel, you glimpse exposed circuitsâ€¦ or veins?

onSay.override: The lever buzzes faintly, as if waiting for something more.
